bike.description: Demo 8 FSR M5 manipulated alloy, 8" travel, asymetrical rear triangle, ISCG mount, 1.5" forged HT, cartridge bearing rear shock mount, rear derailleur protector

components.description: Fox DHX 4.0 coil 8.75x2.75" for Demo 8, rebound adj., ProPedal, bottom out control, and IFP pressure, S:450, M:500, L:550
RockShox Boxxer Race, 200mm travel, alloy steerer, external compression and rebound adj., 20mm maxle DH thru-axle
1.5" 7050 alloy integrated for 1-1/8" steerer
Funn RSX 31.8" direct mount
Specialized Demo low-rise bar, 7050 alloy, 31.8mm, 750mm wide, 9 degree backsweep, 6 degree up
Specialized waffle lock on grip with alloy end plugs
Custom Avid Elixir R hydraulic disc, reach adjust, metallic pads, 203mm rotor
Custom Avid Elixir R, hydraulic disc, reach adjust, metallic pads, 185mm rotor
Custom Avid Elixir R Hydraulic, tool-less adj. reach
SRAM X-9, 9-speed, short cage
SRAM X-7, aluminum trigger
SRAM PG-970, 12-26t
SRAM PC-971, 9-speed w/Power Link
FSA Moto-X MegaExo, forged solid arms, 36t alloy ring with Gamut P-30 chain guide
FSA BB-7000 for Moto-X crank, 73mm shell
Specialized Lo-Pro alloy
Custom DT Swiss F550, 30mm wide, 32h
Hi-Lo disc, 20mm thru-axle, 32h
Thru axle 135mm, hollow 10mm Cr-Mo axle w/ RD guard
DT Swiss Champion 2mm stainless
Specialized Clutch DH 26x2.3", DH casing, wire bead, dual compound
Specialized Chunder DH 26x2.3", DH casing, wire bead, dual compound
Schraeder valve 26x2.4/2.75, 2.25mm thick
Specialized Demo, 8mm hollow Cr-Mo rails, SL foam
6061 butted alloy, two bolt no offset, 30.9mm
7050 hard annodized alloy collar w/ QR, 34.9mm clamp ID, black
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, reflectors, owners manual
